VisionFeature.Name: Goggles of Night
VisionFeature.Text: While wearing these dark lenses, you have darkvision out to a range of 60 feet. If you already have darkvision, wearing the goggles increases its range by 60 feet.

MagicProperty.Name: Goggles of Night
MagicProperty.Description: While wearing these dark lenses, you have darkvision out to a range of 60 feet. If you already have darkvision, wearing the goggles increases its range by 60 feet.
